meanings.sent1: The special stars in my room phosphoresce softly at night.
meanings.sent2: Certain sea creatures phosphoresce in the deep ocean to attract prey.
meanings.sent3: The glow-in-the-dark stickers on my ceiling phosphoresce like tiny nightlights.
meanings.sent4: The fireflies in the meadow phosphoresce, creating a magical dance of light.
meanings.sent5: The watch face phosphoresces, making it easy to read the time in the dark.

meanings.sent5: The jellyfish in the aquarium phosphoresce beautifully, captivating all who see them.
